front.title: Evaluation of Candidate Control and Provisioning of Wireless Access Points (CAPWAP) Protocols

abstract.t: This document is a record of the process and findings of the Control and Provisioning of Wireless Access Points Working Group (CAPWAP WG) evaluation team. The evaluation team reviewed the 4 candidate protocols as they were submitted to the working group on June 26, 2005. his memo provides information for the Internet community.
